id.description: The ID of the audit record.

summary.description: The summary of the audit record.

remoteAddress.description: The URL of the computer where the creation of the audit record was initiated.

authorKey.description: Deprecated, use `authorAccountId` instead. The key of the user who created the audit record.

created.description: The date and time on which the audit record was created.

category.description: The category of the audit record. For a list of these categories, see the help article [Auditing in Jira applications](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/noXKM).

eventSource.description: The event the audit record originated from.

description.description: The description of the audit record.

objectItem.description: Represents an object within a Jira audit record.

id.description: The ID of the associated record.

name.description: The name of the associated record.

typeName.description: The type of the associated record.

parentId.description: The ID of the associated parent record.

parentName.description: The name of the associated parent record.

changedValues.description: The list of values changed in the record event.

fieldName.description: The name of the field changed.

changedFrom.description: The value of the field before the change.

changedTo.description: The value of the field after the change.

associatedItems.description: The list of items associated with the changed record.

id.description: The ID of the associated record.

name.description: The name of the associated record.

typeName.description: The type of the associated record.

parentId.description: The ID of the associated parent record.

parentName.description: The name of the associated parent record.
